CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 大块；块；一块；阻挡；障碍物；街区；大楼；一批；一组；一大叠 （一次大量购买的入场券、股票等）；立方体；积木；纯色色块；一大片土地；区块
阻塞；堵塞；封锁；阻挠；妨碍；拦截；挡住（某人的视线等）；挡住（球、打击等）；遮挡；限制；禁止；（在计算机或网络上）屏蔽；（体育比赛中）挡拆；拦截；封盖；挡球

synonym.mean: 成批的，大块的；交通堵塞的

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 块状的；短而结实的；浓淡不均匀的

word_mean_info__list.difference: 侧重因受到约束或阻碍而造成的行动困难。
语气较轻，多指阻碍、拖延人或事，强调使进展速度缓慢下来。
语气强烈，指有效堵住了通道，使人或物无法通过。
含义广泛，指采取预防措施或设置障碍去阻止某人或某事。
含义与block很接近，指阻塞通道或禁止出入，但有对暗示不用障碍物的阻止或禁止。
正式用词，语气强，多指以干扰或设置障碍的方式阻碍交通，使不能自由畅通。

word_group.brief_definition: 阻挡, 屏蔽；排除 (想法)
积木, 塑料积木；组成部分, 构成要素
方框图；方块图；立体透视图
劈斩用垫木；劈木墩子；砧墩；垫木
高层建筑；摩天大楼塔楼

bilingual.source: She pressed the wooden block on the ink pad.
The doctor explained how clots can block blood vessels.
bilingual.target: 医生解释了凝块如何阻塞血管。

bilingual.source: He struck the iron block with a heavy bob.
He bought a block of cheese from the market.
bilingual.target: 他从市场买了一块奶酪。

bilingual.source: We need a new sliding block to fix this drawer.
bilingual.target: 我们需要一个新的滑块来修理这个抽屉。

bilingual.source: This sliding block is designed very intricately.
bilingual.target: 这个滑块设计得非常精巧。

bilingual.source: The sculpture is made from a solid block of marble.
bilingual.target: 这座雕塑是由一块固体的大理石制成的。

bilingual.source: The artist sculpted a statue from a block of basalt.
bilingual.target: 艺术家用一块玄武岩雕刻了一尊雕像。

bilingual.source: She bought a block of pecorino from the local market.
bilingual.target: 她从当地市场买了一块羊奶酪。

bilingual.source: The colossi were carved from a single block of stone.
bilingual.target: 这些巨像是从一整块石头雕刻而成的。

list.abstract: BLOCK（英[blɒk]，美[blɑːk]），英语单词，作名词为大块、大块石板、独栋大型建筑物等。动词为堵塞、阻塞、压印在。短语搭配有block out（阻挡，屏蔽）。例句有The fence is at least nine feet high and runs nearly half the block long.（栅栏至少有九英尺高，几乎有半个街区长）。 BLOCK的名词近义词有piece、mass等；及物动词近义词有stem、dispute等；反义词有unstuff、free、remember等。

Block（原名：SQUARE）是美国一家移动支付公司，创始人是JackDorsey。Square用户（消费者或商家）利用Square提供的移动读卡器，配合智能手机使用，可以在任何3G或WiFi网络状态下，通过应用程序匹配刷卡消费，使得消费者、商家可以在任何地方进行付款和收款，并保存相应的消费信息，从而降低刷卡消费支付的技术门槛和硬件需求。 北京时间2022年8月5日，Block公布2022财年第二季度财报。报告显示，Block第二季度总净营收为44.04亿美元，与2021年同期的46.81亿美元相比下降6%，Block第二季度总净营收为26.2亿美元，与2021年同期相比增长34%；Block第二季度净亏损为2.09亿美元，相比之下2021年同期的净利润为2.04亿美元。

yingyinNormal.en: Everyone wants to sit next to Emily Elephant. Emily, you put one block on top of another. Like this.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大家都想和艾米丽一起玩，艾米丽，你要把一块积木放在另一块上面。就像我这样。

yingyinNormal.en: What are those pretty rings? They are made of block and ice. Saturn is very very cold. We can build a snowman, George.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那个漂亮的环有什么用呀？它是由岩石和冰块组成的，土星上面非常非常冷的。我们可以在上面堆一个雪人，乔治。

yingyinNormal.en: You know, I once dated this guy who wanted to pretend that he was an archeologist, and I was this naughty cavewoman who he unfroze from a block of ice.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我曾经约会过一个男的，总是想要假装他是考古学家，而我是他从冰块中解救出来，调皮的山顶洞女人。

yingyinNormal.en: Murphy's Law. Whatever can happen will happen. Accident is the first building block of evolution, but when you're orbiting a black hole not enough can happen.
yingyinNormal.zh: 墨菲定律，有可能发生的就一定会发生，意外是进化的第一块积木，但是当你绕着黑洞的轨道，就没有足够的意外发生。

yingyinNormal.en: Worse? You blew up half a bloody block. Well, better half a block than a whole stadium full of people.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还更糟？你炸掉了半个街区。总比人满为患的体育馆被炸了好。

yingyinNormal.en: Luckily none of the bullets hit the engine block. So, we made it to the border.
yingyinNormal.zh: 幸好子弹没打中引擎，我们才能越过边界。

yingyinNormal.en: If we don't give them the ratings, they'll go to Moody's, right down the block.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果我们不这么评，他们就会去找隔壁的穆迪评级了。

yingyinNormal.en: You, too. Anyone cheering you on tonight? Yeah, my mom invited the entire block.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你也是。今晚有人替你加油吗？是的，我妈妈把街坊都请来了。

yingyinNormal.en: It's a frisbee-sized wormhole, Leonard. You can block it with a Frisbee. Calm down.
yingyinNormal.zh: 莱纳德，飞盘大小的虫洞而已，用飞盘就能堵上了，别紧张。

yingyinNormal.en: Meet chimp nine. Here she is tasking at what is called the Lucas Tower, the object of which is to move the tower from peg to peg, without placing a larger block on top of a smaller block.
yingyinNormal.zh: 来见见九号猩猩。视频中她正在玩汉诺塔游戏的目标是通过在三根柱子间调整每层塔的位置使塔层从大到小排列游戏中大片不能压在小片上面。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Rise of the Planet of the Apes》

yingyinNormal.en: What about the wall? 8 feet high. Cinder block. No way through it. You go over or under.
yingyinNormal.zh: 围墙呢？8英尺高的焦渣石，不可能穿过的，你只能从上面或者从下面绕过。

yingyinNormal.en: If we all go for the blonde, we block each other. Not a single one of us is gonna get her.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果我们全都去追美女，我们只会钩心斗角，而没有一个人能得到她。

yingyinNormal.en: Which is? A tech bomb. Designed to block an entire military communication grid for 24 hours.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是什么？一种高科技炸弹，可以阻断整个军队的通讯系统长达24小时。

yingyinNormal.en: I, actually just moved from four blocks over. Ah. But this block is like a whole other world.
yingyinNormal.zh: 事实上，我只从四条街外搬来这里而已，但这里好像另一个世界。

yingyinNormal.en: Five legions to block Deadwind Pass. Another ten here, here, and here, along Redridge Mountains.
yingyinNormal.zh: 五个军团封锁逆风小径，这里另外十个，在这里，还有这里，沿着赤脊山脉。

yingyinNormal.en: No, unfortunately not. Someone is trying to block me, and I need to do it now. Do you need my password?
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，很不幸不行，有人想阻止我，我现在就得行动，你需要我的密码吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Block all exits, cut off their supplies. You make it impossible for them to launch their hovercrafts. Bury them alive.
yingyinNormal.zh: 封堵所有出口，切断一切供给，使他们无法发射自己的飞行器。活埋他们。

yingyinNormal.en: While on your side, you'll be treated to 350 miles of Costcos, Jiffy Lubes, and cinder block homes with above-ground pools.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而这边，你只能面对350英里上的好市多超市，捷飞络汽车服务店，带凸地泳池的煤渣砖房子。

yingyinNormal.en: To start with, 500 grams of strong white flour. So the next building block, 7 grams yeast. That goes to one side of the bowl.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一开始，需要500克的高筋面粉，接下来发面 ，7克的酵母粉放在碗的一侧。

yingyinNormal.en: You have the finest legal mind in this country, a deep understanding of the Constitution, and the Republicans wouldn't dare block your nomination.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你有我国最强的法律头脑，对宪法理解很透彻，共和党不敢阻止你提名。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 一组; 一套; 一批
一大片土地; 房基地

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: hinder the passage, progress, or accomplishment of by or as if by interposing an obstruction

examination_example.sentence: The court threw out the FCC's attempt to <highlight>block</highlight> all state rules on net neutrality.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 法院驳回了联邦通信委员会试图阻碍所有关于网络中立性的州规定的企图。

examination_example.sentence: Some Congress members are trying to <highlight>block</highlight> the plan and challenging it in federal court.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些国会议员正试图阻碍该计划，并向联邦法院提出挑战。

sense_info_list.en: make the movement difficult or impossible
a solid piece of a hard substance
a large single building subdivided into separate rooms, apartments, or offices
a large quantity or allocation of things regarded as a unit
sense_info_list.zh: 一组; 一套; 一批

sense_info_list.en: a building or part of a complex used for a particular purpose
be between someone and the thing they are looking at, so that they cannot see
a large area of land, n area of land for building a house on
sense_info_list.zh: 一大片土地; 房基地

sense_info_list.en: (in sports) hinder or stop the movement or action of

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a solid piece of a hard substance
make the movement difficult or impossible
a large single building subdivided into separate rooms, apartments, or offices
hinder the passage, progress, or accomplishment of by or as if by interposing an obstruction

word_usage.usage:
block多指大块的木头或石块等，piece指一般的“片，块”，较常用。例如:
a piece of bread 一片面包
a block of ice 一块冰

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 含义与 block 很接近, 指阻塞通道或禁止出入, 但有对暗示不用障碍物的阻止或禁止。
语气强烈, 指有效堵住了通道, 使人或物无法通过。
指抑制住强烈的感情或欲望。
多指阻止前进或继续发展。
可指急剧或果断的制止, 也可指用严格的方法加以控制。
侧重因受到约束或阻碍而造成的行动困难。
语气较轻, 多指阻碍、拖延人或事, 强调使进展速度缓慢下来。
主要指抑制愿望、情绪或念头, 也指制止某物的蔓延。
正式用词, 语气强, 多指以干扰或设置障碍的方式阻碍交通, 使不能自由畅通。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: hinder the passage; progress; or accomplishment of by or as if by interposing an obstruction

examination_example.sentence: A truck carrying the sweet load hit a road barrier and overturned, <highlight>blocking</highlight> two lanes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一辆装载甜料的卡车撞上路障，翻倒，堵塞了两条车道。

examination_example.sentence: The road was <highlight>blocked</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 路已经被堵死了。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Block</highlight> the waterways.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 阻塞水道。

sense_info_list.en: make the movement difficult or impossible

examination_example.sentence: On a recent fall morning, a large crowd <highlight>blocked</highlight> the steps at one of Venice's main tourist sites, the Rialto Bridge.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最近一个秋天的早晨，一大群人堵在了威尼斯主要旅游景点——里亚托桥(Rialto Bridge)的台阶处。

sense_info_list.en: a solid piece of a hard substance

examination_example.sentence: This type of play—especially with building <highlight>blocks</highlight>—helps children discover and develop key principles in math and geometry.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种类型的游戏——尤其是积木——帮助孩子接触和发展数学和几何的关键原理。

examination_example.sentence: Indeed, new research demonstrates why laying with <highlight>blocks</highlight> might have been time better spent, Yogman said.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尤格曼说，事实上，新的研究证明了为什么用积木来摆放可能更好。

examination_example.sentence: They were permitted to play freely with <highlight>blocks</highlight>, toys or other children.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们被允许自由地玩积木、玩具或和其他儿童玩耍。

sense_info_list.en: something that blocks a tube or opening
a building or part of a complex used for a particular purpose
be between someone and the thing they are looking at; so that they cannot see
a large single building subdivided into separate rooms; apartments; or offices

word_usage.usage:
block多指大块的木头或石块等，piece指一般的“片，块”，较常用。例如:
a piece of bread 一片面包
a block of ice 一块冰

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 含义与 block 很接近，指阻塞通道或禁止出入，但有对暗示不用障碍物的阻止或禁止。
语气强烈，指有效堵住了通道，使人或物无法通过。
指抑制住强烈的感情或欲望。
多指阻止前进或继续发展。
可指急剧或果断的制止，也可指用严格的方法加以控制。
侧重因受到约束或阻碍而造成的行动困难。
语气较轻，多指阻碍、拖延人或事，强调使进展速度缓慢下来。
主要指抑制愿望、情绪或念头，也指制止某物的蔓延。
正式用词，语气强，多指以干扰或设置障碍的方式阻碍交通，使不能自由畅通。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 块; 街区; 障碍物

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>blocks</highlight> out background noise.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它可以阻挡背景噪音。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Block</highlight> the incoming sound waves
examination_example.sentence_trans: 阻挡传入的声波

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>blocked</highlight> it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们封锁了它。

sense_info_list.zh: 块; 街区; 障碍物

examination_example.sentence: Yes, but a few <highlight>blocks</highlight> downtown would be much more expensive.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 是的，但是到市中心几个街区就要贵得多了。

examination_example.sentence: Did you say the repair shop was three <highlight>blocks</highlight> away from here?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你是说修理店离这里有三个街区远吗？

examination_example.sentence: Go straight ahead and walk about three <highlight>blocks</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一直往前走，走大约三个街区。

examination_example.sentence: Dr. <highlight>Block</highlight>, I need to take a few days off because my father is coming over to visit.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 布洛克医生，我需要请几天假，因为我父亲要来看我。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: block指有效地堵住了所有通道，使人、物等无法通过。
prevent暗示自然存在着某种难以逾越的障碍。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a large single building subdivided into separate rooms, apartments, or offices

examination_example.sentence: The fence is at least nine feet high and runs nearly half the <highlight>block</highlight> long.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 栅栏至少有九英尺高，几乎有半个街区长。

examination_example.sentence: A neighbor called 911 at 11:09 a.m. after seeing smoke coming from a house in the 165 <highlight>block</highlight> of 54th Street Southeast.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一位邻居在看到东南54街165号街区的一栋房子冒烟后，于上午11:09拨打了911。

examination_example.sentence: He tuned left and walked along Fifth Street three <highlight>blocks</highlight>(街区)to Park Avenue and turned right.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他向左拐，沿着第五街走三个街区到公园大道，然后向右拐。

sense_info_list.en: a solid piece of a hard substance

examination_example.sentence: The ship travelled east and stopped next to a large <highlight>block</highlight> of ice around 50 miles from the small island of Hopen.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这艘船向东行驶，停在距离霍本岛约50英里的一大块冰旁。

examination_example.sentence: Before paper was invented, people wrote or drew on materials such as bamboo,silk [silk], animal hide, and wooden <highlight>blocks</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在纸发明之前，人们在竹子、丝绸、兽皮和木块等材料上写字或画画。

examination_example.sentence: They are <highlight>blocking</highlight> (遮挡) the sun.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们遮挡住了阳光。

examination_example.sentence: Each number in a barcode is shown by seven <highlight>blocks</highlight> of the same size.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 条形码中的每个数字都是由七个相同大小的区段组成的。

word_usage.usage:
block多指大块的木头或石块等，piece指一般的“片，块”，较常用。例如:
a piece of bread 一片面包
a block of ice 一块冰
